"The Menacing Castle":
"The remnants of Lutz's army have
summoned a Devil Castle near Cuent!
They've used an abnormal summoning
procedure, and the Devil Castle has
gone berserk as a result.
We will have to take a different approach.
Destroy it quickly, before it can seriously
damage the surrounding area!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"
"We have reports that the remnants of Lutz's army have forcibly summoned a Devil Castle, which has now gone berserk."
"This castle, which unlike the many summoned before, has unmeasurable influence compared to the other castles."
"We want you to quickly defeat this Devil Castle and return peace to the area. Good luck!"
